name: Le Python de Michel
body:
### Welcome to Michel LE PAGE Github.
I am new to Python, so from time to time I try things.
For the while, this page will be a simple collection of some Python codes I write from time to time for my work at CESBIO.

You can also look for me on Research Gate!

### Content.

* GRACE reading and subsetting
* DEM statictics
* DEM unregular grid creation (Modcou)
* Spatial Snow modelling of Wind Redistribution (Winstral, 2002)
* Refererence Evapotranspiration ET0 calculation (Penman-Monteith, Priestley Taylor, Hargreaves and Samani)

### Authors and Contributors
well, @michel-lepage is the only contributor and author for now  ;)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
